smooth_impacts

Source: R/yield_impacts_functions.R
smooth_impacts.Rd

Smooth annual impacts using moving average and output certain time step E.g., 2020_avg = mean(2011:2030)

smooth_impacts(
  data = NULL,
  climate_model = NULL,
  climate_scenario = NULL,
  crop_name = NULL,
  base_year = NULL,
  start_year = NULL,
  end_year = NULL,
  smooth_window = 20,
  output_dir = file.path(getwd(), "output")
)

Arguments

climate_model

Default = NULL. string for climate model name

climate_scenario

Default = NULL. string for climate scenario (e.g., 'ssp245')

crop_name

Default = NULL. string for crop name

base_year

Default = NULL. integer for the base year (for GCAM)

start_year

Default = NULL. integer for the start year of the data

end_year

Default = NULL. integer for the end year of the data

smooth_window

Default = 20. integer for smoothing window in years

output_dir

Default = file.path(getwd(), 'output'). String for output directory

Contents
